title: PBE queue and hardship threads are NOT relevant to the purpose of this Board and WILL BE REMOVED.
body:
From here-on out, all threads posted on this Board relating to PBE wait times or PBE bugs or problems will be removed as low-effort or spam posts. The correct place to share your hardships about this are over on 

https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/

That is the entire purpose of this website. Please use it for its intended purpose and this Board for _its_ intended purpose: Discussion about TFT and TFT gameplay.
